sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import { Calendar, MapPin, DollarSign, Clock, Utensils, Camera, Download, Share2, Heart, Star, Navigation, Phone } from 'lucide-react'; const ItineraryViewer = () => { const { id } = useParams(); const [itinerary, setItinerary] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); // Mock itinerary data for demo useEffect(() => { const mockItinerary = { id: id, city: 'Paris', totalBudget: 2500, days: 5, generatedAt: new Date().toISOString(), summary: 'A perfect 5-day Parisian adventure combining culture, cuisine, and iconic landmarks.', totalCost: 2350, savings: 150, recommendations: [ 'Visit the Louvre early morning to avoid crowds', 'Book Eiffel Tower tickets in advance', 'Try local bistros in Montmartre', 'Use the Metro for efficient transportation' ], itinerary: [ { day: 1, summary: 'Arrival and iconic landmarks', activities: [ { time: 'morning', place: 'Eiffel Tower', description: 'Start your Paris adventure with the iconic symbol of the city', cost: 26, duration_minutes: 120, category: 'attraction' }, { time: 'afternoon', place: 'Arc de Triomphe', description: 'Marvel at this historic monument and enjoy panoramic city views', cost: 13, duration_minutes: 90, category: 'attraction' }, { time: 'evening', place: 'Champs-Élysées', description: 'Stroll down the famous avenue and enjoy evening atmosphere', cost: 0, duration_minutes: 60, category: 'shopping' } ], dining: [ { name: 'Le Petit Bistrot', cuisine: 'French', description: 'Authentic French bistro with classic dishes', price_per_person: 45, price_range: '$$' } ] }, { day: 2, summary: 'Art and culture immersion', activities: [ { time: 'morning', place: 'Louvre Museum', description: 'Explore the world\'s largest art museum and see the Mona Lisa', cost: 17, duration_minutes: 180, category: 'museum' }, { time: 'afternoon', place: 'Notre-Dame Cathedral', description: 'Visit this magnificent Gothic cathedral (exterior only)', cost: 0, duration_minutes: 60, category: 'attraction' }, { time: 'evening', place: 'Seine River Cruise', description: 'Evening boat tour to see Paris illuminated', cost: 18, duration_minutes: 75, category: 'attraction' } ], dining: [ { name: 'Café de Flore', cuisine: 'French', description: 'Historic café frequented by artists and writers', price_per_person: 55, price_range: '$$$' } ] } ] }; setTimeout(() => { setItinerary(mockItinerary); setLoading(false); }, 1000); }, [id]); if (loading) { return (

Loading your itinerary...

); } if (!itinerary) { return (

Itinerary Not Found

The requested itinerary could not be found.

); } return (
{/* Header */}

{itinerary.city} Adventure

{itinerary.summary}

{itinerary.days} days
Budget: ${itinerary.totalBudget}
{itinerary.city}, France
Export PDF Share
{/* Budget Summary */}

Budget Overview

${itinerary.totalCost}
Total Cost
${itinerary.savings}
Savings
${Math.round(itinerary.totalCost / itinerary.days)}
Per Day
 {/* Recommendations */}

Travel Tips & Recommendations

{itinerary.recommendations.map((rec, index) => (

{rec}

))}
{/* Daily Itineraries */}
{itinerary.itinerary.map((day, dayIndex) => (

Day {day.day}

{day.activities.length} activities • {day.dining.length} dining options

"{day.summary}"

{/* Activities */}

Activities

{day.activities.map((activity, index) => (
{activity.time} {activity.category}

{activity.place}

{activity.description}

{activity.duration_minutes} min ${activity.cost}
))}
{/* Dining */}

Dining

{day.dining.map((restaurant, index) => (

{restaurant.name}

{restaurant.cuisine} {restaurant.price_range}

{restaurant.description}

${restaurant.price_per_person} per person
))}
))}
); }; export default ItineraryViewer;
